EmailTemplate.name: DRE-Sanofi Upcoming training March-2017
EmailTemplate.subject: Doctor Evidence Upcoming Training Sessions- MARCH 2017
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
*|DRE-Sanofi Upcoming Trining March-2017|*
Dear Sanofi Colleague,
Doctor Evidence has launched an engagement with Sanofi across several therapeutic areas and functions, supporting literature review activities, related data analytics, and initiatives including RWE, AI, and Big Data. As part of the launch process, we are conducting training sessions covering the below topics. Training sessions are planned live in Paris, Cambridge, and Bridgewater, as well as via Adobe Connect, to provide flexibility for attendees. To register for a session, please click on one of the days below to be included in the session.
Thank you,
Nancy Morgan Director of Education and Training 301 Arizona Ave Suite 301 Santa Monica CA 90401 Doctor Evidence
Introductory Module Course Description High level overview of DRE capability, data sources that feed into it, how to ask questions, and how DRE can address strategic data needs Format and Timing 90 minutes in-person or Adobe Connect Pre-requisite None
